opcodes.name: Trap
opcodes.doc: Trap unconditionally with a trap code.

opcodes.name: ConstF64
opcodes.doc: `dst = f64` encoded as raw IEEE bits.

opcodes.name: Br
opcodes.doc: Branch based on `cond` to `pc_true` or `pc_false` (byte offsets).

opcodes.name: TupleGet
opcodes.doc: Read tuple element at an immediate index.

opcodes.name: StructGet
opcodes.doc: Read struct field at an immediate index.

opcodes.name: ArrayGet
opcodes.doc: Read array element at an index register.

opcodes.name: ArrayGetImm
opcodes.doc: Read array element at an immediate index.

opcodes.name: I64Div
opcodes.doc: `dst = a / b` (`i64`, traps on divide-by-zero and `i64::MIN / -1`).

opcodes.name: I64Rem
opcodes.doc: `dst = a % b` (`i64`, traps on divide-by-zero and `i64::MIN % -1`).

opcodes.name: DecToU64
opcodes.doc: `dst = a.mantissa` (`Decimal` to `u64`, traps if `scale != 0` or mantissa < 0).

opcodes.name: I64ToDec
opcodes.doc: `dst = Decimal { mantissa: a * 10^scale, scale }` (traps on overflow).

opcodes.name: U64ToDec
opcodes.doc: `dst = Decimal { mantissa: a * 10^scale, scale }` (traps on overflow).

opcodes.name: StrSlice
opcodes.doc: `dst = s[start..end]` (byte indices; traps on invalid range or non-boundaries).
